definition: to have a holiday or vacation
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: But have you ever heard that the students had holiday because the schoolmaster moved to new house?
sentences.chinese: 但是你聽說過因爲校長喬遷新居所以學生放假嗎？

sentences.english: GM to shut US plants up to 9 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車美國工廠將放假9周。

sentences.english: Cunninghamia lanceolata let turtle Tian Dazuo give the city the Japanese off for three days.
sentences.chinese: 杉木讓龜田大佐給全城的日軍放假三天。

sentences.english: The holiday officially lasts six days, but many workers take a month off.
sentences.chinese: 法定春節假期爲6天，但是很多農民工會放假一個月。

sentences.english: We seldom have a holiday. It is out of humanity to make up the fucuking missed lessons.
sentences.chinese: 難得放假，卻讓我們補課補得死去活來，真不人道。

sentences.english: Try to maintain your animal-friendly eating habits when you go on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試在放假時養成喫善待動物的農場出品的食物吧。

sentences.english: Last month, I went to Guilin and Yangshuo by train for my holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上個月放假自己坐火車去了一趟桂林和陽朔遊玩。

sentences.english: I worked in a small beachside restaurant during the college vacation.
sentences.chinese: 學院放假時，我在海濱的一家小餐館裏打工。

sentences.english: On thinking about the holiday, I can't help being quite excited.
sentences.chinese: 放假，我的激動之情就不能自已。

sentences.english: Schools give a vacation from July 12 to September 1.
sentences.chinese: 學校自7月12日到9月1日放假。

sentences.english: They urged that the library be kept open during the vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他們極力主張在放假期間圖書館應當照常開放。

sentences.english: K3 pupils who have not joined the activity will have the day off.
sentences.chinese: 不參加之高班學生，是日將放假一天。

sentences.english: Isabel went out to enjoy the scenery as soon as the holiday started.
sentences.chinese: 放假伊莎貝爾就去嬉遊山水了。

sentences.english: I in Low bottom, you? We had a vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在婁底，你呢？我們放假了。

sentences.english: Maybe they can now take a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 或許他們現在可以放假了。

sentences.english: These little boys have holidays at school and help their parents to dig a pit for the house toilet.
sentences.chinese: 學校放假，這些小男孩幫助父母挖坑用做家庭廁所。

definition: to compensate for working on a holiday by resting on a workday/to compensate for resting on a workday by working on a holiday
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
(of holidays) to come to an end/end of a vacation
the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month
to shift holidays, taking a weekday off
